subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson had his first below-par score in a major since winning last year’s British Open, but he is 12 shots behind the leader, Rory McIlroy.
snippet: Phil Mickelson had his first below-par score in a major since winning last year’s British Open, but he is 12 shots behind the leader, Rory McIlroy.
